# Gopichand Dandimeni - Portfolio

## About
Cybersecurity and Digital Forensics student at Sandip University, Nashik. Passionate about web development, data analysis, and cybersecurity research.

## Current Status
- Final year B.Tech CSE student specializing in Cybersecurity and Forensics
- Cybersecurity Intern at CyberWarLab (Dec 2025 - Jan 2026)
- Winter Consulting Program participant at IIT Guwahati

## Skills
- Programming: C, C++, JavaScript, Java, Python
- Web Development: HTML, CSS, React.js, Node.js, Express.js
- Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
- Cybersecurity & Digital Forensics
- Data Structures and Algorithms

## Projects
1. Personal Portfolio Website - Modern responsive portfolio with AI features
2. AgriPredict - Agricultural prediction application
3. Simpson's Rule Calculator - Mathematical computation tool
4. Security Pass Management System
5. AI Learning Coach - IBM AI-powered learning assistant
6. Speedy Study Demo - Study management application

## Experience
- Girls Script Summer of Code 2025 Mentor
- Campus Ambassador for multiple organizations
- Cyber Forensics Specialist Intern at Cyber Privilege
- Data Analysis Virtual Internship at IIT Guwahati
